baseline.note: Last known good working baseline. App.tsx was manually overwritten from app.txt and app runs via npm run dev.

safety_rules: Backup before every script to C:\"QuoteSync\\web\\_backups\" with name format <file>.before_<description>_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.bak
No partial / in-place edits. For large files like src/App.tsx, scripts must restore snapshot or write complete file atomically.
Fail fast: if expected inputs/paths are missing, abort without writing.
ui_rules: LOOK/STYLE LOCKED: no design changes unless explicitly requested by user. Style is locked.

projects.rule: Always belong to a Client; selected from Client context

estimates.rule_detail: EF-EST-YYYY-001 (incremental within each year; year on 1 Jan and sequence resets to 001)

positions.rule: Always belong to an Estimate; added within Estimate view

scripts.name: baseline-lockin-manifest.ps1
scripts.notes: Creates/updates manifest files; does not modify UI files.

scripts.name: wire-default-client-and-estimate-refs.ps1
scripts.notes: Seeds default client/project and updates reference generation. No UI style changes.
